description: Can't sign in with google or Email ... so can't use the app! says network error!
Can't sign in. There is a network error
Had looked for an app to use as a Path for life goals and had been using map/ flowchart software for this so this is a God sent. Thanks

All of a sudden i have 10431.93% on a task and the time spent is 1,681:17 
despite me doing the task for about 3 hours
Doesn't have basic functionality or protection-from-user expected in any program someone would try to sell. Esoteric to understand how to do things, despite simple system.

Great idea and design.
First, its not fully developed and has been priced already.
Second, Its difficult to understand what the features are ment for. You have to spend time to understand all the features first and then try to use it , and then use it, and then it takes a lot of time before you get used to it. Its complex.
summary: complex. Not simple enough to use

description:
This is a different approach to managing your daily todo's and not just a task list.
works great.
Great to visualize from goals to every day tasks that contribute to their completion

I didn't have any trouble logging in. I love how this app is laid out, and it has all the features that I am looking for in a time tracker. That being said, there are a few bugs. The developer seems quite open and active. Overall, I'm quite excited to see where this goes!

For years I have looked for a complete solution to get my ducks in a row. I have been using a pomodoro timer, an excel sheet, a journaling app, and assorted checklists. Now I have one tool to rule them all!
The developer is quite active and responsive. If you find a bug, he would like you to send it to kelvin@angstrom.life
summary: Exactly what I've been looking for

description: I hate this data gathering.
summary: Forced to use google or give email

description: Without a vision one cannot easily formulate life goals nor without passion can one be motivated. In short angstrom (note the supercilious lower case "A") is boring.
Waiting for mobile apps
Great app!..Great looking UI

reaching one's life goals might be considered an issue of at least medium importance. privacy issues arise, one has too choose what data is shared with a cloud service.
when I have to choose between storing my private info in the cloud with a new service or not using this app -> I choose to not use the app. my data is more important than your service. sorry.
think about creating an offline version, then you will have lots of users.
summary: sorry, but saving all my live in the cloud is a no-go

description: There is no need for the account other than to get money. The program feels bloated and looks polished but is not intuitive

This app is so amazing, it is so polished also. You can really organize things.
I LOVE IT. Thank you author!
Really like this app. It's well polished, does what it intends to do perfectly. Must have for goal setters.

I am really enjoying using Angstrom to manage my time and energy. As a working professional with three kids and a very active home life, I have found that this software has helped me prioritize the things that are truly important. Thanks to its metrics, it has also provided me lots of insight into how I actually use my time. Hugely helpful!

The one snag is that there seem to be some implementation fixes waiting on the Windows beta. The Linux client works flawlessly.
summary: Great productivity management and tracking softare!

description: The freeware version is not good to use, especially the bad encoding takes a lot away.
The tool works great IMO. There is still room for improvement, but the app is still young. I've had to rethink about my tasks a bit, but now I use it daily.

No logro crear mas life goals, y en el tutorial no dice nada sobre como crear nuevos life goals, o quiza la version gratuita solo tiene tres? tambien algunas no las necesito como mejorar mi vida social jaajaja no hay forma de quitarla
summary: Se ve bien pero no puedo probarla del todo

description: its only in spanish?

Plus d'excuses pour la procrastination, tout est là ou presque ^^ on voit que ce qui n'est pas encore fait va arriver (application mobile par exemple sûrement pratique pour chronométrer certaines taches).
J'adore la présentation j'ai longuement chercher dans différentes applications de gestion du temps et tâches mais là c'est clair et en plus on dispose d'un mode sombre (clair sombre voilà quoi). Bref je recommande !
summary: Motivant et permettant de s'organiser au mieux!

description:
Самый интересный time и project менеджер.
Интересная идея, хорошая реализация
summary: Самый интересный time и project менеджер

description:
Имея полную версию это просто супер. Все классно.
